# FTP setup

* ipconfig
* port 21 is the default FTP port for windows computers
* PC ip may change frequently so update on both good reader and filezilla
* services.msc in run.exe to ensure filezilla is running
* Connect to wired network in morning and load up AutoCAD. Connect to wireless network for the rest of the day.
* Check the IP address hasn't changed daily
* Edit > Users> Shared Folders
